message.text: Fire multiple arrows in quick succession. Staggers large enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>
Fires a shot capable of piercing multiple targets. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Shortens the interval between hits, increasing the likelihood of hitting more times.</COL>
Fires three arrows in a wedge pattern. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>
Fires an arrow that produces a deafening blare on impact, breaking enemy guard. Will also launch nearby enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increase Blow Force LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>
Sends a wall of arrows skyward to rain down on a broad area. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>
Looses a spinning arrow that delivers a barrage of hits to an area. Especially effective with status arrows. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>
Applies an explosive stun effect to all arrows loaded. Increases damage inflicted. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>

Draws the bow with all the user's might, then looses a shot straight ahead. Power increases if released immediately. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases total charge stages (1→2).</COL>
